name: Fast Food Never More
description:
Ollie doesn't play sports and has bad eating habits.
After visiting the doctor, Ollie found he was not in good health.
Ollie is happy with his body, but he doesn't exercise enough and eats a lot of junk food.
Your goal is to help Ollie lose 10kg collecting all the natural and healthy foods and destroying the fast foods that come on Ollie's way.
Gameplay takes place in a world of side scrolling platforms, so run, jump and explore all territories to reach your goal.
Features:
- Jump
- Run left and right.
- Up and down the ladder.
- Collect healthy items.
- Collect ammo.
- Collect health.
- 10 species of monsters to hinder your goal.

This journey will not be easy, but you will make it!
